item.description:
This is a chance for all Libertarians or Libertarian-minded people in the Lowell area to gather together on the UMass Lowell South Campus and discuss issues, ideas, etc. For those of you who plan on attending, here are some quick directions on how to find the meeting area:

- The address of the building is 889 Broadway Street, Lowell MA 01854

- No matter what direction you are coming from, you will see a small side street off the main road of the UMass Lowell South campus. This small dead end road will have a security guard booth at roadside's edge, but no one is there at that time. Turn onto this road.

- Follow this road until the end where there will be a loop going up a small hill on your left, and the building where the meeting is held will be in front of you/on your right as you turn onto the loop.

-Once inside, take a right and the meeting is right in the couched lobby area.

If anyone has any questions as they get close, please feel free to give me a call at 508-361-8845.

Hope everyone can make it!
item.name: UMass Lowell Libertarian Meetup
